messages.title: Keep John as your MP - vote
messages.content: Birmingham Yardley MP John Hemming has been given the all clear by Sir Thomas Legg over expenses claims for the last 5 years. Sir Thomas was asked to examine every claim submitted by all MP's and check they were in order and justified.

messages.title: John Hemming Serving YOU
messages.content: John Hemming MP campaigning for You & Yardley, all the way to the top in Westminster.

messages.title: Iain Bowen asks for 4 more years as your Councillor
messages.content: On May 6th, well-known local Councillor Iain Bowen seeks re-election to Birmingham Council. During his 4 years representing Acocks Green, he has tirelessly campaigned alongside residents on local issues.

messages.title: Re-elect Hardworking, Popular MP John Hemming
messages.content: John Hemming MP campaigning for You & Yardley, all the way to the top in Westminster.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems want to cut the tax bills of low paid workers and local families. Plans include paying back an additional Â£700 off your tax bill for millions of people, making the tax system fairer.

mentions.candidate: It was an honour to present former servicemen with their veterans badges.

issues.economy: Lib Dems want to cut the tax bills of low paid workers and local families.
issues.education: I was proud to join staff at Yardley School, to celebrate their fantastic results.
issues.governance: Birmingham Yardley MP John Hemming has been given the all clear by Sir Thomas Legg over expenses claims for the last 5 years.

quotes.text: We won our battle to stop the government taxing the popular game of Bingo into extinction.

images.caption: John Hemming MP with constituents and events
